# ENV-003: Channels

**Priority**: HIGH  
**Version**: 1.0.0  
**Last Updated**: 2026-01-25

## Purpose

Registry of all public-facing channels and distribution endpoints. This includes social media accounts, websites, and any external platform where content is published.

## Websites

| Name | URL | Purpose | Status |
|------|-----|---------|--------|
| Bilko Bibitkov | `https://bilkobibitkov.replit.app` | Main application hub | Active |

## Usage

When building distribution workflows:
1. Look up the target channel in this registry
2. Use the documented Page ID or account identifier
3. Reference the channel's purpose to ensure content alignment

## Adding New Channels

To register a new channel:
1. Add entry to the appropriate table above
2. Include: Name, ID/URL, Purpose, Status
3. Update any workflows that will use the channel
4. Document in ENV-002 which workflows target this channel
